content.title: Cyctron Infini X1: Kickstarter Success & Next Steps!
content.creator:
CYCTRON
March 10, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
Our 45-day Kickstarter campaign has officially come to an end, and we want to take a moment to express our deepest gratitude to each and every one of you. Your support, enthusiasm, and trust in Cyctron Infini X1 have made this campaign a great success!
Thanks to you, we have achieved an outstanding milestone:
🚴 $36,508 pledged
📈 730% funded
While this campaign may be over, the journey of Cyctron Infini X1 is just beginning!
What’s Next?
🔹 Survey Reminder
To ensure a smooth and successful delivery, please take a moment to fill out the backer survey and confirm your shipping address as soon as possible. This step is crucial in helping us process your order efficiently.
🔹 Production in Progress
We are happy to share that production of Cyctron Infini X1 is already underway! Our team is working diligently to bring your e-bikes to life, ensuring they meet the highest quality standards. We will keep you updated on our progress as we move forward.
🔹 Estimated Shipping Timeline
We remain on track to begin shipping in May 2025. As we get closer to the delivery date, we will provide additional updates regarding logistics, tracking information, and what to expect when you receive your Cyctron Infini X1.
Stay Connected!
Although our Kickstarter campaign has concluded, this is just the start of our journey together. We invite you to stay connected with us for future updates, tips, and exclusive community content.
If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to us at marketing@cyctronbike.com. We are always happy to help!
Once again, thank you for believing in Cyctron Infini X1. Your support means the world to us, and we can’t wait to deliver your e-bikes and see you ride with excitement!
With gratitude,
The Cyctron Team 🚴‍♂️
